title: Click
short_plot_summary: An overworked architect named Michael is given a universal remote from the eccentric scientist Morty, allowing him to control time. As he starts to use the remote to avoid challenges, Michael learns valuable lessons about life and family.
explanation: A family, representing Michael's family and the importance of family in the movie
A scientist, representing Morty, the eccentric stranger who gives Michael the remote
A spiral, representing the 'Beyond' section of Bed Bath & Beyond where Michael finds the remote
A fast-forward symbol, symbolizing the remote's ability to control time and Michael's attempts to skip life's challenges
A skull, representing the eventual confrontation with mortality and the consequences of using the remote
